sources.title: Why Pick On Me (1918) Directed By Gilbert Pratt
sources.description: Why Pick on Me? Produced by Hal Roach Starring Harold Lloyd Release date October 13, 1918 Country United States Languages Silent English intertitles Why Pick on Me? is a 1918 short comedy film starring Harold Lloyd . [ 1 ] Cast Harold Lloyd Snub Pollard Bebe Daniels William Blaisdell Sammy Brooks Harry Burns William Gillespie Helen Gilmore Lew Harvey Bud Jamison James Parrott References "Progressive Silent Film List: Why Pick on Me?" . Silent Era . Retrieved March 14, 2010 .

metadata.Plot: The world that Harold Lloyd sets up in these short films are close enough to our reality for us to believe in him as a character. His slapstick comedy is fantastic, and he combines the silent era with his own extraordinary imagination to create exciting two-reelers.
